code:
export const saveCommands=commands=>{return new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{// eslint-disable-next-line no-undef
chrome.storage.sync.set({commands},()=>{// eslint-disable-next-line no-undef
if(chrome.runtime.lastError){// eslint-disable-next-line no-undef
reject(chrome.runtime.lastError.message);}else{console.log('Commands saved successfully!');resolve(null);}});});};export const getCommands=()=>{return new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{// eslint-disable-next-line no-undef
chrome.storage.sync.get(['commands'],result=>{// eslint-disable-next-line no-undef
if(chrome.runtime.lastError){// eslint-disable-next-line no-undef
reject(chrome.runtime.lastError.message);}else{const commands=result.commands||[];resolve(commands);}});});};
